info.name: rems-and-katsu-test
info.description: A collection of requests testing the REMS add-entitlements webhook, which is ingested by the Consents service to initialize ProjectConsents.

exec: // Test that response values equal the expected values

request.description:
In order to create a user in REMS, you must provide the user ID of a user with the owner role in the x-rems-user-id header.
Therefore, at least one user must actually log in to REMS via the UI and then have the owner role assigned to them. After this is done, all other users may be created by POSTing to this endpoint.

request.description: This is a placeholder for requests to Katsu made by the applicant. The Headers should include the X-CANDIG-EXT-REMS header, containing the applicant's Visa from the REMS /api/permissions endpoint.
